name: Gothic
description: This Installer downloads and installs SystemPack 1.0
notes: Before installing this Mod you need to install Patch 1.08k and PlayerKit 1.08k
content:
files:
- patch: https://static.piranhabytesitalia.it/file/piranhabytesitalia/mirror/g1classic-systempack-1.0.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    description: Moving the SystemPack
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/g1classic-systempack-1.0.exe
    src: patch
- task:
    description: Running the SystemPack
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/g1classic-systempack-1.0.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: gothic
